name: Grilled Shrimp Scampi Cocktail
author: Heidi T
summary: A nice twist on a classic favorite. When catering I serve mine hanging from the edge of a HUGE martini glass with crushed ice in the center and a bowl of red cocktail sauce propped in the ice.
ingredients: ⅛ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
directions: Place shrimp, olive oil, garlic, salt, and black pepper in a resealable plastic bag
Coat shrimp with oil mixture, squeeze out excess air, and seal bag
Marinate in refrigerator for up to 4 hours
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
Cook shrimp on preheated grill until they are bright pink on the outside and the meat is no longer transparent in the center, about 5 minutes per side
Serve with cocktail sauce and lemon wedges
